content.rendered:
The prices on the list are subject to change.

The prices are as quoted on the list and are only valid for 14 days from the date of the Price list. Please contact us on info@draughtcraft.co.za for final quotes and confirmation.

excerpt.rendered: The price list is valid for 14 days from the date on the list. Prices can change at any time without notice. Please email us on info@draiughtcraft.co.za if you have any questions or if you wait to order.
